Package com.redis.ds.ds_grid

Class GridDS

java.lang.Object
com.redis.ds.ds_grid.GridDS
public class GridDS extends Object
The grid data source manages a row x column grid of DataItem cells in memory. It implements the five CRUD+S methods and supports advanced queries using a DSCriteria. In addition, this data source offers save and load methods for data values. This can be a useful data source if your grid size is small in nature and there is sufficient heap space available.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole

    • saveSchema

      public void saveSchema(String aPathFileName) throws IOException
      Stores the schema definition of the underlying data source (formatted in XML) to the file system.
      Parameters:
      aPathFileName - Path/file schema should be written to
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O related exception

    • loadSchema

      public void loadSchema(String aPathFileName) throws IOException, ParserConfigurationException, SAXException
      Loads the schema definition file and assigns it to the internal data grid instance. Note: This operation will result in the emptying of the data grid.
      Parameters:
      aPathFileName - Schema path file name
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O exception
      ParserConfigurationException - Parser exception
      SAXException - DOM exception

    • updateSchema

      public boolean updateSchema(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSchemaDoc)
      Updates the data items captured in the DataDoc against the schema. The data items must be derived from the schema definition. Note: The data document must designate a data item as a primary key and that value must be assigned prior to using this method.
      Parameters:
      aSchemaDoc - Data document instance
      Returns:
      true on success and false otherwise

    • saveSmartClient

      public void saveSmartClient(String aPathName) throws IOException
      Saves the schema of the underlying data source (formatted as a SmartClient DS XML file. The name of the file is derived from the schema of the data source and the location of the file is specified as a parameter. Note: Developers are encouraged to override this method if you have a specialized storage scenario.
      Parameters:
      aPathName - Path name where the file should be written
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O related exception.

    • loadData

      public void loadData(String aPathFileName, boolean aIsHeaderSchema) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException, IOException
      Loads the data (formatted as a CSV file) into the internal data grid.
      Parameters:
      aPathFileName - CSV path file name
      aIsHeaderSchema - If true, then the header will parsed as the schema
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source exception
      IOException - I/O exception

    • saveData

    • count

      public int count() throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Calculates a count (using a wildcard criteria) of all the rows stored in the content source and returns that value.
      Returns:
      Count of all rows in the data source
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • fetch

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid fetch() throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Returns a DataGrid representation of all rows fetched from the underlying data source (using a wildcard criteria).
      Returns:
      DataGrid representing all rows in the data source
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • fetch

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid fetch(int anOffset, int aLimit) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Returns a DataGrid representation of the rows that start at the offset specified with the row count limited by the parameter.
      Parameters:
      anOffset - Starting offset into the matching content rows.
      aLimit - Limit on the total number of rows to extract from the content source during this fetch operation.
      Returns:
      Data grid representing all rows that match the criteria in the content source (based on the offset and limit values).
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • fetch

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid fetch(com.redis.foundation.ds.DSCriteria aDSCriteria) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Returns a DataGrid representation of the rows that match the DSCriteria specified in the parameter.
      Parameters:
      aDSCriteria - Data source criteria
      Returns:
      Data grid representing all rows that match the criteria in the content source.
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • fetch

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid fetch(com.redis.foundation.ds.DSCriteria aDSCriteria, int anOffset, int aLimit) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Returns a DataGrid representation of the rows that match the DSCriteria specified in the parameter. In addition, this method offers a paging mechanism where the starting offset and a fetch limit can be applied to each content fetch query.
      Parameters:
      aDSCriteria - Data source criteria.
      anOffset - Starting offset into the matching content rows.
      aLimit - Limit on the total number of rows to extract from the content source during this fetch operation.
      Returns:
      Data grid representing all rows that match the criteria in the content source (based on the offset and limit values).
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • suggest

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid suggest(String aFragment, com.redis.foundation.data.Data.Operator anOperator, int aLimit) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Returns a DataGrid representation of the rows that match the suggestion fragment string (case insensitive), applying the logical operator and limiting the results returned.
      Parameters:
      aFragment - String fragment (case insensitive)
      anOperator - Logical operator
      aLimit - Result limit
      Returns:
      Data grid representing all rows that match the suggestion query against the data source.
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • suggest

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid suggest(String aFragment, int aLimit) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException

      Parameters:
      aFragment - String fragment (case insensitive)
      aLimit - Result limit
      Returns:

    • search

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid search(String aTerms, com.redis.foundation.data.Data.Operator anOperator, int anOffset, int aLimit) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Returns a DataGrid representation of the rows that match the search term(s) (case insensitive), applying the logical operator and limiting the results returned.
      Parameters:
      aTerms - Search terms (case insensitive)
      anOperator - Logical operator
      anOffset - Starting offset
      aLimit - Result limit
      Returns:
      Data grid representing all rows that match the search terms query against the data source.
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • findDataDocByPrimaryId

      public Optional<com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc> findDataDocByPrimaryId(String anId)
      Finds and returns an optional data document if its primary id can be matched in the internally managed data grid instance. Note: The data document must designate a data item as a primary key and that value must be assigned prior to using this method.
      Parameters:
      anId - Primary id value
      Returns:
      Optional data document

    • findDataDocByPrimaryId

      public Optional<com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc> findDataDocByPrimaryId(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc)
      Finds and returns an optional data document if its primary id can be matched in the internally managed data grid instance. Note: The data document must designate a data item as a primary key and that value must be assigned prior to using this method.
      Parameters:
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Returns:
      Optional data document

    • add

      public boolean add(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Adds the data items captured in the DataDoc to the data source. The data items must be derived from the same schema definition. Note: The data document must designate a data item as a primary key and that value must be assigned prior to using this method.
      Parameters:
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Returns:
      true on success and false otherwise
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • update

      public boolean update(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Updates the data items captured in the DataDoc within the data source. The data items must be derived from the schema definition. Note: The data document must designate a data item as a primary key and that value must be assigned prior to using this method.
      Parameters:
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Returns:
      true on success and false otherwise
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • loadApplyUpdate

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc loadApplyUpdate(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Convenience method that will pre-load a DataDoc from the data source, apply the changes identified in the method parameter, perform the update operation and return the full version of the data document instance.
      Parameters:
      aDataDoc - Data document instance (just items that changed)
      Returns:
      Data document instance reflect complete updates
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • delete

      public boolean delete(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Deletes the row identified by DataDoc within the data source. Note: The data document must designate a data item as a primary key and that value must be assigned prior to using this method.
      Parameters:
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Returns:
      true on success and false otherwise
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception

    • analyze

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid analyze(int aSampleCount) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Analyzes the contents of the grid to determine its statistical composition.
      Parameters:
      aSampleCount - Sample value size
      Returns:
      DataGrid instance of item analysis details
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source related exception
